title: Biden says Russia is committing ‘genocide’ in Ukraine
content:
1. Biden says Russia is committing ‘genocide’ in Ukraine  NBC News
  2. Biden says Russia is committing 'genocide'; Putin says peace talks at 'dead end': Live Ukraine updates  USA TODAY
  3. Biden calls Putin's actions in Ukraine 'genocide'; Putin warns Russia cannot be isolated from the West  CNBC
  4. Biden Calls Putin A 'Dictator' Who 'Commits Genocide'  NBC News
  5. 'Genocide': Biden Uses the Word for First Time to Describe War in Ukraine  Newsweek
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
